attributes.action: Require Ofcom to ensure that all viewers who currently receive their analogue TV signal through a public relay transmitter will be able to recieve DTTV after the change-over
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Information about the signal coverage of full strength DTTV transmissions is totally inadequate, there is no coverage map, it is only by post code and unless your query is of the most basic type you have to phone them.
In this electronic age there should be an email communication facility.
